card_text: 2+ monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck$NThis card gains effects based on the card types (Fusion/Synchro/Xyz) of materials used for its Link Summon.$N●Fusion: Your opponent cannot activate monster effects during the Battle Phase.$N●Synchro: Your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards and effects during your Main Phase.$N●Xyz: Your opponent cannot activate the effects of cards in the GY during your Main Phase or Battle Phase.
